name: Dischord Warrior
description:
Guide Vibrana through the Halls of Melody.

Learn frequencies from the Notaries; press V to play the learned sound.

If your sound clashes with a Spearball's sound, it will fade and Vibrana can pass. (If not, Vibrana will fade, so be careful!)

Get to the portal to escape!

Created for the 2017 Global Game Jam.
